dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3833482D] Copyright Claim - Copyright Infringement of DragonBall Z C
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 13, 2007 9:48 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3833482D] Copyright Claim - Copyright Infringement of
DragonBall Z CD Soundtracks

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright Claim - Copyright Infringement of DragonBall Z CD Soundtracks
Added by system at Friday, Apr 13 2007 02:25 pm 
X-MailFrom: bruce@faulconer.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Fri Apr 13 14:25:40 2007

Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net

  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 13 Apr 2007 19:25:39 -0000

Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); 
  Fri, 13 Apr 2007 14:25:39 -0500

helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)

 with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
        (Exim) 
        id 1HcROs-0004mc-Sb 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 13 Apr 2007 14:25:38 -0500

Received: from [64.207.22.248] (port=49636 helo=[10.0.1.203])

        (envelope-from <bruce@faulconer.com>)

User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; PPC Mac OS X Mach-O; en-US; rv:1.7.2)
Gecko/20040804 Netscape/7.2

Subject: Copyright Claim - Copyright Infringement of DragonBall Z CD Soundtracks 
Content-Type: multipart/alternative; 
 boundary="------------040308030900030705080908" 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 13 Apr 2007 19:25:39.0282 (UTC) FILETIME=[84E20320:01C77E01] 

 (multipart/alternative) 
Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
MIME element (text/plain) 
To Whom it May concern: 
 
The files/website/webpages below must be immedieately removed from the  
serviers under your controll and/or license.  This information was  
obtained in the database of WHOIS online. 
 
Kindly call me with any questions you may have. 
 
Sincerely 
 
Bruce Faulconer 
Faulconer Productions Music Corporation 
972-818-2427 
 
 
-------- Original Message -------- 
Subject:         [Fwd: [Fwd: Copyright Claim - Copyright Infringement of  
DragonBall Z CD Soundtracks]] 
Date:         Fri, 13 Apr 2007 14:22:02 -0500 
From:         Bruce Faulconer <bruce@faulconer.com> 
To:         jay@jayg.com 
 
 
 
Jay Gissinger 
 
The files/website/webpages below must be immedieately removed from the  
serviers under your controll and/or license.  This information was  
obtained in the database of WHOIS online. 
 
Kindly call me with any questions you may have. 
 
Sincerely 
 
Bruce Faulconer 
Faulconer Productions Music Corporation 
972-818-2427 
 
-------- Original Message -------- 
Subject:         [Fwd: Copyright Claim - Copyright Infringement of DragonBall Z  
CD Soundtracks] 
Date:         Fri, 13 Apr 2007 11:40:06 -0500 
From:         Bruce Faulconer <bruce@faulconer.com> 
To:         supremedragonx@gmail.com 
CC:         Bruce Faulconer <bruce@faulconer.com>, "Faulconer Productions Music  
Corp." <lisa@faulconer.com> 
 
 
 
Justin Allen: 
 
You are violating United States Copyright Laws, infringing on  
copyrighted music and musical soundtrack on your web site. 
 
You are herein notified to immediately CEASE and DESIST; or you shall be  
sued in Federal Court, and any other appropriate legal action deemed  
necessary by this corporation. 
 
http://www.saiyanunlimited.net/?id=media/dlosts 
 
I strongly urge you to immediately act on this demand and take down the  
illegal DragonBall Z CD Soundtrack downloads. 
 
Sincerely 
 
Bruce Faulconer 
Faulconer Productions Music Corporation 
 
 
 
-------- Original Message -------- 
Subject:         Copyright Claim - Copyright Infringement of DragonBall Z CD  
Soundtracks 
Date:         Tue, 10 Apr 2007 12:35:09 -0500 
From:         Bruce Faulconer <bruce@faulconer.com> 
To:         copyrightclaims@wildwestdomains.com 
CC:         bruce@faulconer.com, lisa@faulconer.com 
 
 
 
April 10, 2007 VIA EMAIL 
 
 
To: 
WIld West Domains 
14455 N Hayden Road, Suite 219 
Scottsdale, Arizona 85260 
 
From: 
 
Bruce Faulconer 
President 
Faulconer Productions Music Corporation 
17817 Davenport Road, Suite 100 
Dallas, Texas 75252 
972-818-2427 
 
The website, "SaiyanUnlimited.Net" is infringing on the copyrights of  
music and music CD soundtracks controlled and/or owned by Funimation and  
Faulconer Productions Music Coporation.  SaiyanUnlimited.Net is offering  
free UNAUTHORIZED DOWNLOADS of this copyrighted material. 
 
We demand that this infringement cease and that the site shall desist  
and desist from continuing all illegal infringement activities and  
furthermore demand that the infringed material be immediately removed  
from your servers. 
 
Details of the infringement follow below. 
 
Regarding: 
 
COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT 
 
Infringement of DragonBall Z CD Soundtracks: 
 
The Best of DragonBall Z, Volume 2 and 
The Best of DragonBall Z, Volume 3
